markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Log Roll](/Feats.aspx?ID=1234) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Turpin Rowe Lumberjack](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=40)

**Prerequisites**
[Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1232)

**Requirements**
You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.

</column>

---

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check against the adjacent creature’s Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.
name: Log Roll
requirement: You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.
